concept.title: Diagnosis for Platen Conditions
concept.shortdesc: The condition of the platen post-cleaning helps to deteremine whether the platen needs to be replaced, refinished, or sanded.

strow.stentry: Hardened or has micro cracks throughout the roller.
The platen roller needs to be refinished.
Severe indentation markings from type slugs or extensive cracking throughout the roller.
The platen roller needs to be replaced.
Minimal indents or cracks and feels glazed over or mildly hardened.
The platen roller needs to be sanded.
No cracks, indents, or hardened spots and still feels rubbery to the touch.
